name: crnc
description: currency conversion and functionality for the web
author: Chase Moskal <chasemoskal@gmail.com>

scripts.build: run-s clean && run-p compile importly && run-s test
scripts.importly: importly < package-lock.json > x/importmap.json && importly --host=unpkg < package-lock.json > x/importmap-cloud.json
